content: You are a venue coordinator assistant analyzing email inquiries.

                            Hello!Can you please confirm if the venue has a microphone available for us touse? Additionally, I believe you mentioned that there are party lights anda smoke machine, do we need to book these out separately?*Best Regards,**Boluwatife Ogunniyi | Event Team Lead**UofT Nigerian Students’ Association *On Thu, Oct 31, 2024 at 1:00 PM Taco Taco  wrote:> Confirmed! We have sent a calendar invite as you are now fully booked for> that night. Does that work for>>>>>>>>> you?>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> TacoTaco Events Team>>>>>>>>> (647) 692-4768>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>  | info@eattaco.ca>>>>>>>>> eattaco.ca>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> On Fri, Oct 25, 2024 at 11:43 PM Nigerian Students Association <>>>>>>>>> nga.uoft@gmail.com> wrote:>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Hello,>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Thank you for providing the details on the space.>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Regarding the cost, is there a payment plan available or are we>>>>>>>>>> required to pay everything in full before the day of our event?>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> *Best Regards,*>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> *Boluwatife Ogunniyi | Event Team Lead *>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> *U of T Nigerian Students’ Association *>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> On Fri, Oct 25, 2024 at 11:20 PM Boluwatife Ogunniyi <>>>>>>>>>> boluwatife_ogunniyi@yahoo.com> wrote:>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> ----- Forwarded Message ----->>>>>>>>>>> *From:* Taco Taco >>>>>>>>>>> *To:* boluwatife_ogunniyi@yahoo.com <>>>>>>>>>>> boluwatife_ogunniyi@yahoo.com>>>>>>>>>>>> *Sent:* Friday, October 25, 2024 at 08:24:39 PM EDT>>>>>>>>>>> *Subject:* Fw: New Event Inquiry>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Thank you for reaching out to us about hosting your Y2K-themed>>>>>>>>>>> end-of-the-year party at Moonlight Lounge on November 28, 2024. We're>>>>>>>>>>> excited to let you know that our space is available for your event on that>>>>>>>>>>> date.>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> As the event falls on a Thursday, our rental rate for the>>>>>>>>>>> Moonlight Lounge would be $125 per hour, with a minimum spending>>>>>>>>>>> requirement of $500. Since you mentioned approximately 120 guests, please>>>>>>>>>>> note that our maximum capacity is 194, but we comfortably accommodate 150>>>>>>>>>>> guests.>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Our space comes equipped with a dancefloor, professional sound>>>>>>>>>>> system with karaoke, party lights, smoke machine, private bar staffed with>>>>>>>>>>> two bartenders, and private washrooms. You'll also have access to our full>>>>>>>>>>> sound system, allowing you to connect your own music via Bluetooth or use a>>>>>>>>>>> provided tablet with a Spotify playlist. Additionally, we have a TV for>>>>>>>>>>> use, which can be connected via HDMI port.>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> If you have any further questions or would like to proceed with>>>>>>>>>>> booking, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We'd be happy to discuss>>>>>>>>>>> more details.>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Best regards,>>>>>>>>>>> TacoTaco Events Team>>>>>>>>>>> 647-692-4768>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> ------------------------------>>>>>>>>>>> *From:* luan.ngo@eattaco.ca >>>>>>>>>>> *Sent:* Friday, October 25, 2024 11:47 AM>>>>>>>>>>> *To:* info@eattaco.ca >>>>>>>>>>> *Subject:* New Event Inquiry>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Name: Boluwatife Ogunniyi>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Phone: 7055006223>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Email: boluwatife_ogunniyi@yahoo.com>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Description: The Nigerian Association at the University of>>>>>>>>>>> Toronto is hosting a Y2K-themed end-of-the-year party that promises to be a>>>>>>>>>>> nostalgic and vibrant celebration. The event will feature a DJ and exciting>>>>>>>>>>> activities like dance-offs, and a best-dressed contest etc. We are hoping>>>>>>>>>>> to host the event at Moonlight Lounge. Please let us know if you have any>>>>>>>>>>> specific question in regards to the logistic of the event.>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Date: 2024-11-28>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Guests: 120>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
                        
                    

[Specific Instructions: ]. If no year is specified, assume it's 2024.

Subject: Re: Venue Inquiry on Microphone Availability and Amenities

Hello Boluwatife,

Thank you for your inquiry! 

Yes, we do have a microphone available for use at the venue, so you don't need to worry about that. As for the party lights and smoke machine, those are included in the rental of the Moonlight Lounge, so there's no need to book them separately.

If you have any further questions or need assistance with your event planning, feel free to reach out!

Best regards,

TacoTaco Events Team  
647-692-4768  
info@eattaco.ca  
eattaco.ca
